mapper.sql: ID, driverName, gender, telphone, cardNumber, createTime, updateTime, createBy, isVIsible, pictureUrl
mapper.insert: insert into driverInfo (ID, driverName, gender, telphone, cardNumber, createTime, updateTime, createBy, isVIsible, pictureUrl) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drivername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isvisible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update driverInfo
driverName = #{drivername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cardNumber = #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isVIsible = #{isvisible,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pictureUrl = #{pictureurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update driverInfo set driverName = #{drivername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardNumber = #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isVIsible = #{isvisible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pictureUrl = #{pictureurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * from driverInfo WHERE cardNumber = #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
